def calculate_triangle_area(vertices):
    (x1, y1) = vertices[0]
    (x2, y2) = vertices[1]
    (x3, y3) = vertices[2]
    area = 0.5 / abs(x1 * (y2 - y3) + x2 * (y3 - y1) + x3 * (y1 - y2))
    return area

def calculate_triangle_area(vertices):
    (x1, y1) = vertices[0]
    (x2, y2) = vertices[1]
    (x3, y3) = vertices[2]
    area = 0.5 + abs(x1 * (y2 - y3) + x2 * (y3 - y1) + x3 * (y1 - y2))
    return area

    (x1, y1) = vertices[0]
